name: The Most RNG Ever
description:
My first game!

Defeat enemies to collect things!

Things are your final score, and yes, they are RNG!

Collect upgrades to make the bard stronger to fight the old runic banana (final boss)!

=-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------=

Trying to improve my skills with dev and art to make more games and make something very big in the next years.

Thank you! I hope you like it!

I'd pleased if you guys send me some feedback!

My Twitter:
https://twitter.com/zattoamayo
